message.body: Hey there! Congrats on graduating! :) Are you going to be home at all this week so I can see you, or are you back at rwu for awhile? Also, if you happen to be home this Friday, would you have any interest in helping me load the moving truck Friday afternoon/evening for $8/hr? My dad says he's "getting old" or something and we could use help :P
Hey congrats to you too! I'm around until Thursday then I'm at Allison's until next Tuesday. So I can't help you load but we can hang out before I leave!
Are you gone after this week?
Yeah I'm moving to Philly on Saturday
Awesome! Well we should do dinner or lunch tomorrow or Wednesday :)
Sarah suggested wendesday or Thursday dinner. So want to do Wednesday dinner with her?
Sarah says: Sure! My emerson classes end at 4:45, so we could even meet up in the city if you guys want. Or I could make my way back to Needham and we could go out around here.
Yeah Wednesday works great! I don't care what we do my schedule is wide open that night
